abstract: New York State Gov Andrew M Cuomo rejects proposal from Liberty Natural Gas to build liquefied natural gas port off Long Island, citing environmental and national security concerns; port would have been first in state.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo said the plan, which called for an underwater buoy system and pipeline, would pose a threat to the environment and make an inviting target for terrorists.

headline.main: Cuomo Rejects Natural Gas Port Proposed Off Long Island
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Rejects Plan for Offshore Gas Port

snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo said the plan, which called for an underwater buoy system and pipeline, would pose a threat to the environment and make an inviting target for terrorists.
